# serval_user (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "serval_user" "example_user" {
  id = "id"
}
```

## Schema

### Read-Only

- `avatar_url` (String)
- `created_at` (String) Timestamp in RFC 3339 format
- `deactivated_at` (String) Timestamp in RFC 3339 format
- `email` (String)
- `first_name` (String)
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `last_name` (String)
- `name` (String)
- `role` (String) Available values: "USER_ROLE_UNSPECIFIED", "USER_ROLE_ORG_MEMBER", "USER_ROLE_ORG_ADMIN".
